summary: This document is a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team to Judge Alison J. Nathan regarding the unsealing of materials in her case. It appears to be a formal legal communication from the defense to the court.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the letter, which concerns unsealing materials in her case.

persons.name: Alison J. Nathan
persons.context: The recipient of the letter, a judge presiding over the case.

connections.description: Judge Nathan is presiding over the legal case involving defendant Maxwell.

events.title: Defense Letter Regarding Unsealing
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell's legal team sends a letter to Judge Alison J. Nathan concerning the unsealing of case materials.

keyFacts: The document is a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team to Judge Alison J. Nathan.
The subject of the letter is the unsealing of materials related to Maxwell's case.
The communication originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The letter was sent on August 20, 2020.
